articles.title: New AAP guidelines for childhood obesity include medications and surgery - Toowoomba Chronicle
articles.description: For the first time, new guidelines from the American Academy of Pediatrics on childhood obesity include medications and surgery. FOX medical team's Doctor Mike joins us to talk about it.
articles.content: For the first time, new guidelines from the American Academy of Pediatrics on childhood obesity include medications and surgery. FOX medical team's Doctor Mike joins us to talk about it.
